评论概述: Finally a cropped jacket for us little people
评论详情: I like that it’s cropped. When you’re 5‘2“ everything goes to mid thigh. The product arrived on time, but was shrink wrapped so tightly. I wonder if the wrinkles will ever come out. That said, the buttons will all have to be moved (if I decide to keep this) including those on the wrists. They’re simply placed incorrectly and when buttoned, it’s all clunked up in the front. I ordered two additional jackets in different colors. We’ll see the condition of those when they arrive and how much work would be involved if those buttons need to be moved as well. Have not laundered yet.

It’s cozy, warm, and lightweight, making it ideal for layering without adding bulk. Highly recommend for petites looking for a comfy and flattering shacket!"

I loved the shacket I ordered a medium it fit perfect I got compliments the first day I wore it quality is great color is perfect as posted and I will order more in different patterns loved it the value is worth it the weight is light so you can wear something underneath it you can dress up or dress down with it very nice

Doors are misaligned and won't stay shut. Gaps in doors.  And of course, I bought it on Oct for a Xmas present and by the time Xmas got here, I couldn't return it any longer. It almost look as if this piece had been used. When we went to put it together, there were finger prints all over the glass and missing pieces. Very frustrating

My daughter bought this exact shacket in Nov 2023. I borrowed it for a chilly night at a causal outdoor bar in the south and it kept me warm, was soft and had a relaxed fit (size small).  My family complimented the way it looked on me and I also loved how it felt and looked.  Nice material, good thickness, and easy to button.  I ordered the same item in Dec 2024. What a total disappointment! The differences are crazy.  The new material is thin, it's difficult to button and the small was a bit too tight across the back when buttoned (just had a t shirt beneath). I'm so sad because I love the print and the length but sadly it's being returned. Might want to reconsider this item.

I like the length and overall fit. The pink is not as vibrant as what was pictured. The button holes are difficult to get the buttons through. Over time I’m sure the button holes will stretch. Overall I really like the jacket. It can be worn with jeans or dress slacks.
Perfect for light weather.
It ran really large, which I didn't see in the size guide.
